Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Square, Triangle

    public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the parent class which is used to model general shapes. It contains all instance variables that have been defined for the other classes to inherit and utilize.
    Author:
    siddharth

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] getX()
      A method for retrieving the x-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in the screen coordinate system.
      int[] getY()
      A method for retrieving the y-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in the screen coordinate system.
      void rotate(double dt)
      A method for rotating the shape about its center by an angle of dt.
      void setVertices(double d)
      A method for setting the local coordinates of the vertices of a shape.
      void translate(double dx, double dy)
      A method for translating the center of the shape by dx and dy respectively along the x and y directions of the screen coordinate system.

    • Method Detail

      • setVertices

        public void setVertices(double d)
        A method for setting the local coordinates of the vertices of a shape. This is a dummy method and is supposed to be overridden in the subclasses.
        Parameters:
        d - The distance of edge from center

      • translate

        public void translate(double dx,
                      double dy)
        A method for translating the center of the shape by dx and dy respectively along the x and y directions of the screen coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        dx - The value to be added to xc
        dy - The value to be added to yc

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double dt)
        A method for rotating the shape about its center by an angle of dt.
        Parameters:
        dt - The value for the angle to be added

      • getX

        public int[] getX()
        A method for retrieving the x-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in the screen coordinate system.
        Returns:
        The coordinate values rounded to the nearest integers.

      • getY

        public int[] getY()
        A method for retrieving the y-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in the screen coordinate system.
        Returns:
        The coordinate values rounded to the nearest integers.
